Appetizers.name: Hot Wings
Appetizers.description: Take your mouth to flavor town with these spicy wang thangs.

Appetizers.name: Not Hot Wings
Appetizers.description: Leave flavor town behind for a staycation in boringsville with this sorry excuse for food.

Cold Sandwiches.name: Club
Cold Sandwiches.description: Pretty much the same as any other club you've ever had.

Cold Sandwiches.name: BLT
Cold Sandwiches.description: Only one of these ingredients is good, and it's the only one you need.

Hot Sandwiches.name: Burger
Hot Sandwiches.description: Why get a McDouble for a dollar when you can spend 11.95 here?

Hot Sandwiches.name: PBJ
Hot Sandwiches.description: Why is it hot, you ask? Get it to find out. Disclaimer: It's not any good.

Desserts.name: Hot Wings
Desserts.description: Stay in flavor town with this zesty dessert.

Desserts.name: Chicken Shake
ingredients: Same as the Hotwings, but all ground up!

Drinks.name: Pond Water
Drinks.description: If you can drink this and the Chicken Shake your meal still isn't free.

Drinks.name: Irish Car Bomb
Drinks.description: It's like a streetfight in your mouth.
